page.title: 13Farming Improvements.
page.content: The land locally has been improved by farmers.Fields have been made bigger by pulling up some{hedges}so that bigger machines can be used.In little fields you waste ground turning machines round.All the farmers in the area have improved the{drainage}-lots of land was too boggy to grow crops before.They also have{new breeds}of catttle to give better milk and leaner meat.They keep{milk charts}to see which cows give the best milk and they only use those for breeding.Animals are given{injections}to stop them getting diseases and passing them on to humans.They grow{new crops}like fodder beet,oil seed rape and new breeds of wheat and barley.Some im- provements have{disadvantages.}Sprays to kill pests,removing hedges{harm {wildlife}and in big fields the wind can flatten crops and remove soil.
